ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Blackbox Refiner
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes i did petition but the GM didnt repop him, only told me that he was forwarding the info about him not being there to Veerant :-(((( i waited there for 6
ygData.messageBody:
Yes i did petition

but the GM didnt repop him, only told me that he was forwarding the info about him not being there to Veerant :-((((

i waited there for 6 damn hours :-((


Askur of Veeshan


----- Original Message -----
From: "Joe D" <joed@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 11:58 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Blackbox Refiner


> From: Joe D <joed@...>
>

> > i was trying to do this quest today but Joglwas no where to be found :-((

> you /petition, the GMs can repop him.
>
> Pasketti, Povar
